amendment.description: To require the inclusion of information regarding visa revocations in the National Crime Information Center database.

action.text: Amendment SA 3850 ruled non-germane by the chair.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 3850.

Amendment SA 3850 proposed by Senator Sessions for Senator Grassley. (consideration: CR S10345-10346) To require the inclusion of information regarding visa revocations in the National Crime Information Center database.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3850 proposed by Senator Sessions for Senator Grassley.
